program.name: MundoMe Slovenia
program.description:
MundoMe Slovenia -

MundoMe is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

 

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. MundoMe is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

 

Affiliate Benefits:

 

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

 

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by Pincode or SMS. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

 

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
SI traffic only

Incentivized/VC traffic is NOT allowed.

 

•    Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•    Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•    Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•    Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•    Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

 any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

program.tc:
Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.
Negative list: Bigpoint Actionliga FussballManager XBlaster F1Manager Dark Orbit IceFighter Germanys Next Topmodel Mafia1930 Spaceinvasion Gladiatoren Chaoscars Deine11 Parsec Managergames Hockey Gladiatoren 2 The-Pimps Damoria Managergames Soccer Robofighter Land of Destruction Fragoria Seafight Gladius 2 The Mafia Glorykings Starpet PopstarsTheGame Speedcars Farmerama Battlestar Galactica Online Zoomumba War Of Titans Crimejacks Deepolis Hellblades Maestia Warstory Ponyrama Emporea Gangs of Crime Gangs of Crime 1930 Ruined Online Toon Racer BeBees Drakensang Online
Example of bookings which are not allowed: Bigpoint Big point Big-point Bgpont
If campaigns are being run for competitors who are on the negative list, it is forbidden to show Bigpoint games or to link directly to www.bigpoint.com or any of the Bigpoint games on the landing page of the corresponding search request.

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

 

Affiliate Benefits:

 You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

program.name: Destinia - PT - Non Incent
program.description:
Offer Review

Destinia offers the best price for online hotel and flight reservation with NO BOOKING FEES!

 

Affiliate Benefits

Destinia gives attractive commissions to affiliates with two levels of commissions. Affiliates who make more sales earn a higher commission! PREMIUM affiliates will earn 7% on confirmed hotel reservations and 7 € per flight sale!

 

User Flow

A user come to Destinia.com through an Adsmarket affiliate, makes a booking for a flight or hotel and pays with their credit card.

 

Typical Demographics

Any user with a valid credit card.

 

Sales are validated up to 60 days from the day of the online booking.

 

Oferta de revisão
Destinia oferece o melhor preço de hotéis on-line e reserva de voo sem taxa de reserva!

Destinia dá comissões atraentes para os filiados com dois níveis de comissões. Afiliados que fazer mais vendas ganhar uma comissão mais alta! Afiliadas PREMIUM ganhará 7% em reservas de hotel confirmado e 7 € por trajecto venda!

Manual de Fluxo
Um usuário vir a Destinia.com através de uma filial Adsmarket, faz uma reserva para um voo ou hotel e paga com seu cartão de crédito.

Demografia típica
Qualquer usuário com um cartão de crédito válido.

As vendas são validadas até 60 dias a contar da data da reserva.

program.name: RetroGamer US (RGxdm420)
program.description: Program Title: Retrogamer, good old days are back again! Offer Review: Sister site to IWON.com, one of the top gaming destinations on the Web, this Mindspark™ product features classic arcade favorites including Frogger®, Dance Dance Revolution®, Track and Field® and Double Dribble Fast Break®. Affiliate Offer: Retrogamer™ is already a crowd favorite for young and old, and with more games on the way, the excitement continues to build. Clearly, this blast from the past has a promising future! User Flow: User gets to the landing page, download the application and install on his computer.
program.restrictions:
Traffic from markets listed in campaign name only as per the below tiers:
US

 Publishers that are interested in running any IAC program must sign this addendum first: http://docs.matomy.com/1/Advertisers/Forms/IAC-publisher-addendum.pdf
Link to complete IAC Guidelines: http://docs.matomy.com/1/Publishers/IAC-guidlines.pdf.
Association upon Matomy account manager approval only.
DISPLAY ONLY. No Incentivized, No content locking, no VC. No distribution through adware or spyware. No distribution on sites for children under 13. No distribution on sites owned, operated or managed by Mindspark or any of it's affiliated companies.
Valid lead criteria: user downloads and installs the product. Pixel fires upon successful installation.
Browsers: IE and FF only. Chrome links separately

All creatives must be approved by the advertiser. The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Adsmarket representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives. All creatives (even if previously approved by the advertiser) must include the relevant IAC product's logo. The borders (frames) of all banners must be visible to the viewer, and cannot blend into the background of the site where it is displayed. No mention of Hulu is permitted. No duplicate IPs. 

Pubs are NOT allowed to mention any reference of "Elf Yourself" in any of client's ads, ad copy or landing pages for any of the products as this is a trademarked name.
Mindspark offers are not to be advertised via PageRage or any of it's affiliates
Advertising is not allowed on firstrowsports.eu. Please see guidelines for full list of sites to blacklist.
Ads cannot be placed so that they are covering/on top of media players. 
Ads are not allowed to reference any text/content offering special access to premium content/materials, or to live broadcast TV.
 No SEM. Facebook traffic of any kind is not allowed. A publisher who will use Facebook to promote this program will not be compensated for generated commissions and will risk suspension from Matomy Market

GDN is allowed as long as creatives/texts are provided by/approved by the advertiser.

No torrents or peer-to-peer traffic

program.name: MundoMe France - Incentivized
program.description:
MundoMe is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. MundoMe is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
FR traffic only

Incentivized/VC/Content locking traffic is allowed

 

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

 Email traffic from sender "service@sfr.fr" is strictly forbidden, and all future email drops need to be approved by advertiser.


any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

Affiliate Offer:
High converting mobile content subscription offers from Jamba Mobile, one of the leading entertainment companies in the world.

User Offer:
Users registering to the mobile content offer recieves content on a subscription base via a MT conversion flow.

User Flow:

 E-Plus – 1-click flow

1.    User clicks on the banner and is redirected to the landing page with the selection of products.

2.    User clicks on one of the products and is subscribed to Jamba offer.

T-Mobile, vodafone – 2-click-flow:

1. User clicks on the banner and is redirected to the landing page with the selection of products.

2. User clicks on one of the products and is redirected to the order page where he has to confirm his order by clicking on "download"

3. By clicking on "download" a user is subscribed to Jamba offer.

O2 flow:

User clicks on banner and is forwarded to Landing page

- user clicks on purchase button is forwarded to Enter mobile phone number page

-user enters mobile phone number and clicks on send

- user receives sms and answers this with start

- user gets billed and is forwarded to downloadpage

program.name: Easyvoyage - FR - Site Under - Non Incent
program.description:
Description générale :
 Comparez les prix de plus de 300 000 offres de voyages chez les plus grandes agences, et trouvez aussi bien votre billet d'avion que votre nuit d'hôtel ou votre location de voiture au meilleur tarif. Lancé en janvier 2001 par Jean-Pierre Nadir, Easyvoyage est le premier portail éditorial consacré au voyage. Easyvoyage présente une approche originale avec une combinaison de cinq dimensions : de forts contenus éditoriaux (équipe de 23 journalistes permanents), comparaison des offres du marché (vols, circuits, séjours, hôtels), notation des hôtels de séjours par des journalistes professionnels (plus de 12 000 hôtels qualifiés), notation des produits par les internautes (forum de discussion…) et sélection des bons plans du web envoyée à nos abonnés. Easyvoyage est leader de l’infomédiation en France. Notre but est de vous informer et vous orienter dans vos choix de voyages grâce à nos moteurs de recherche vous permettant de gagner du temps et de vous présenter les prestations de nos partenaires correspondant le mieux à vos attentes.

 Bénéfice pour les éditeurs :
Easyvoyage est une marque forte sur la France. La transformation de ces moteurs de comparaison de prix est garantie par : - la performance technique des recherches (comparaison de plusieurs millions de vols en temps réel), - une offre quasi-exhaustive avec près de 300 marchands référencés, - un tunnel de conversion très court.

Conversion d'un lead :
Uniquement vols
- moteur de recherche (page d'atterrissage) - page de résultats - clic sur une offre commerciale
Clique sortant

 Cible :
 - IPs françaises, - plus de 25 ans.

Description:
http://www.Easyvoyage.com is the first editorial portal devoted to travel with trade intermediation. Easyvoyage presents an original approach combining four dimensions in one site: high-quality editorial content (a team of nearly 100 people, with 25 journalists who work non-stop seven days a week), comparison of market offers (flights, tours, holidays and hotels), classification of hotels (over 6,000 hotels qualified) and community approach (forum and product grading by the clients).

Offer Benefits:
Easyvoyage receives an average of 100,000 visitors a day, amounting to more than 6 million a month, with 10 million pages viewed. 10% of French Internet surfers use Easyvoyage to prepare their trip (holidays and tours). In 2009, Easyvoyage generated a volume of sales in excess of 450 million euros
User Flow: CPL, click-out flow. User searches Easyvoyage for flights. Then he will get a list of search results. Once the user clicks on one of the search results they got, a new window will appear and redirect them to their result. Pixel will fire on this Pop.
Target:
french Ips +25
Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250  


Valid lead: User search easyvoyage interface for flights only on the search box. Then he will get a list of flight search results.Once the user clicks on one of the search results he got, a new window will appear for redirect. Pixel will fire on the Pop.

program.name: Qubble Portugal

Qubble is the newest brand which is part of Sam Media. Sam Media is a provider of high quality mobile content such as ringtones, wallpapers, Java Games and SMS2WIN services. If you are a publisher, blogger, email list blaster with an International reach, this is the program for you! Top payout rates! Good compatibility with social networks and great converters for all media types. Extremely high conversion rates with attractive landing pages and a clear focus on call-to-action! Newest mobile content with a variety of games, ringtones and wallpapers. Frequent free bonus content for customers. 
User Flow: User needs to enter his mobile number, receive a personal pincode and introduce the pincode on the landing page to register.

program.name: Trivicell PT- Non Incent
program.description:
Welcome to Trivicell’s New  campaign for Portugal! This program allows you the best Payout for Portugal, with new and exciting products!

MT Flow. After the user enters his phone number, he receives a SMS massage with a Pincode that he needs to put in the LP.

conversion is made By Server to Server Live Reporting!

TriviCell, is a leading Mobile entertainment brand focused on competition based services with high pay outs for affiliates. Our competition services create great opportunities for the end users and therefore have a very high conversion rates from clicks to sales. TriviCell believes that in order to bring the best traffic to its landing pages, we should highly incentivize our affiliates; and therefore offers the best pay outs for any sales, with the most advanced tracking system that enable the affiliate to monitor the exact conversions from clicks to leads to sales.
program.restrictions:
PT Traffic Only.
The affiliate shall not generate traffic through the following distribution methods: phishing, spamming or the use of spiders or robots.
Usage of the word “FREE” or words with the same or similar meaning are not allowed in conjunction with any of the
Trivicell campaigns. Additionally, creative’s used in conjunction with any Trivicell offers may not be
misleading or deceptive. 
The following words and words with the same or similar meaning shall NOT be used:
•             Click here to claim your prize
•             Only X prizes left!
•             Only X minutes left!!
•             FREE/ free
•             Congratulations! You have won an XXX!
•             You are the winner of an XXX!
•             Daily winner!
•             Collect your XXX!
•             You are selected to receive a free XXXX
•             Guaranteed prize
Note: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Adsmarket representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

For campaign # 319651 Scratch and Win - New - PT - Non incentivized - The usage of the word "Worten" or imply to this brand in any way (including in Email creatives) is NOT allowed (not even in the subject or the from line).

Pop up/under publishers must cap traffic at 40k pops daily until receiving feedback that they can increase

program.name: Yur Mobile Poland-Non Incentivized - ADT
program.description:
Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by Pincode or SMS message. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
PL traffic only

Incentivized/VC traffic is NOT allowed

 

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.


any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

program.name: Easyvoyage FR Non Incent Display Only
program.description:
Description générale :
 Comparez les prix de plus de 300 000 offres de voyages chez les plus grandes agences, et trouvez aussi bien votre billet d'avion que votre nuit d'hôtel ou votre location de voiture au meilleur tarif. Lancé en janvier 2001 par Jean-Pierre Nadir, Easyvoyage est le premier portail éditorial consacré au voyage. Easyvoyage présente une approche originale avec une combinaison de cinq dimensions : de forts contenus éditoriaux (équipe de 23 journalistes permanents), comparaison des offres du marché (vols, circuits, séjours, hôtels), notation des hôtels de séjours par des journalistes professionnels (plus de 12 000 hôtels qualifiés), notation des produits par les internautes (forum de discussion…) et sélection des bons plans du web envoyée à nos abonnés. Easyvoyage est leader de l’infomédiation en France. Notre but est de vous informer et vous orienter dans vos choix de voyages grâce à nos moteurs de recherche vous permettant de gagner du temps et de vous présenter les prestations de nos partenaires correspondant le mieux à vos attentes.

 Bénéfice pour les éditeurs : 
Easyvoyage est une marque forte sur la France. La transformation de ces moteurs de comparaison de prix est garantie par : - la performance technique des recherches (comparaison de plusieurs millions de vols en temps réel), - une offre quasi-exhaustive avec près de 300 marchands référencés, - un tunnel de conversion très court. 

Conversion d'un lead : 
Uniquement vols
- moteur de recherche (page d'atterrissage) - page de résultats - clic sur une offre commerciale
Clique sortant

 Cible :
 - IPs françaises, - plus de 25 ans.

Description:
http://www.Easyvoyage.com is the first editorial portal devoted to travel with trade intermediation. Easyvoyage presents an original approach combining four dimensions in one site: high-quality editorial content (a team of nearly 100 people, with 25 journalists who work non-stop seven days a week), comparison of market offers (flights, tours, holidays and hotels), classification of hotels (over 6,000 hotels qualified) and community approach (forum and product grading by the clients).

Offer Benefits:
Easyvoyage receives an average of 100,000 visitors a day, amounting to more than 6 million a month, with 10 million pages viewed. 10% of French Internet surfers use Easyvoyage to prepare their trip (holidays and tours). In 2009, Easyvoyage generated a volume of sales in excess of 450 million euros
User Flow: Click out flow -User search easyvoyage interface for flights only on the search box. Then he will get a list of flight search results.Once the user clicks on one of the search results he got, a new window will appear for redirect. Pixel will fire on the Pop. 
Target:
french Ips +25

Valid lead criteria: Click out flow -Users searches easyvoyage interface for flights on the search box and arrive at a search results page. Once the user clicks on one of the search results, a new window will appear for redirection. Pixel will fire on the pop.

Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250
program.restrictions: Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250

program.name: Yur Mobile Norway-Non Incent
program.description:
Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
NO traffic only

Incentivized/VC traffic / Content blocking  is NOT allowed.


•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in NO way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.


•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.


•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.


•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.


•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.


Text which is not allowed in Norway :

- sentences where ' user has won, you are the winner, you have won a prize' etc

only use ' chance to win" " you could win"

- forbidden wording like: congratulations, you have unclaimed prizes x iphones left

- no countdown clocks, timers or pressure

any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

program.name: Easyvoyage UK Site Under/Pop Ups Non Incent
program.description:
Description:
http://www.Easyvoyage.com is the first editorial portal devoted to travel with trade intermediation. Easyvoyage presents an original approach combining four dimensions in one site: high-quality editorial content (a team of nearly 100 people, with 25 journalists who work non-stop seven days a week), comparison of market offers (flights, tours, holidays and hotels), classification of hotels (over 6,000 hotels qualified) and community approach (forum and product grading by the clients).

Offer Benefits:
Easyvoyage receives an average of 100,000 visitors a day, amounting to more than 6 million a month, with 10 million pages viewed. 10% of French Internet surfers use Easyvoyage to prepare their trip (holidays and tours). In 2009, Easyvoyage generated a volume of sales in excess of 450 million euros

User Flow: Click out flow -User search easyvoyage interface for flights only on the search box. Then he will get a list of flight search results.Once the user clicks on one of the search results he got, a new window will appear for redirect. Pixel will fire on the Pop. 

Target:
UK Ips +25
Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250

program.description:
Program Title:    
Stronghold Kingdoms

Offer Review:   
Stronghold Kingdoms is the medieval online castle game. Join hundreds of thousands of players in a rich world of Lords, Ladies, Bumpkins and Barons as you build your village, research new technology and strive to be the greatest in the land. Construct mighty castles to defend your lands against insolent intruders, develop your economy and trade your way to victory, lead your fellow noblemen to war and control of the Kingdom. program.description:
A note about payouts:
The publisher will receive the correct payout based on items bought. If more than one type of item is bought, the publisher will receive a number of commissions based on all items.The publisher's payouts are the following:
  • Hotels/Home Rentals - 5%
  • Flights - $5
  • Cruise – 3%
  • Activities - $5
  • Car Rentals – 3%

Offer Review:
Last Minute Travel and Easy Click Travel are full service online travel agencies for bargain shoppers where thousands of great deals on hotels, vacation packages, cruises, flights and more are merely a few easy clicks away.
Over 40,000 hotels worldwide, 100 airlines and 5,000 activities.

Affiliates Benefits:

International target markets
Exlusive rates
Promos and special rates for top affiliates
Variety of media chanels allowed - SEM is exclusive at Matomy Market!

Travelers, online shoppers
program.restrictions:
Pop sites - please ask for the explicit approval of the account manager before running.

In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager.

Valid Conversion Criteria: 
A valid sale occurs when a user Customizes a search on the site/s and Chooses a desired Flight/Hotel/Package/Cruise/Activity/Car-Rental/Vacation Home; Inputs travel, personal and billing information; and Completes a booking & purchase on the site.
Commissions will not be paid for returned sales or sales made from an invalid/stolen credit card.

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

CO traffic only

Incentivized/VC traffic is NOT allowed


 

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

BANNERS deatils:
Service has to be clearly identified through by the service name mention in legible letters or using the logo of the service.

Banners cannot pretend to be a feature of the site that you are being promoting, example: 
banner with Play icon and the phrase "Watch Movie" over the site movies playback.
download banner with icons saying "Download Now" between the real buttons of the  actual download site

Banners must not show a generic button with a call to action like "download now" for the sole purpose of click. The banner must have images or text that clearly describe the service. Would be prohibited using banners, that the only call-to-action they have are, for example:
o    DOWNLOAD
o    DOWNLOAD NOW
o    WATCH/SEE MOVIE

Banners with white, black or transparent background must have a visibly contrasting color edge to the background to distinguish well as something that is not part of the page where the banner is displayed.

Using fake or misleading IDs and Messages on Instant Messengers and Social Networking Platforms to advertise Services. Creating a false impression of winning a prize, entering a lucky draw or lottery, etc before directing to Mobitrans Services etc. Creating false impressions by promoting services that are not 100% free for the consumers as if they are free by using for instance texts like: Free Ringtones, or 100% Free Videos.
Advertising through usage of any type of malware, virus or otherwise unwanted software installations on the end users’ device or computer.
 
The Affiliate Partner will not promote services on sites (mobile or web) that are not suitable for viewing by a general audience. The following are examples of the type of sites that are not suitable. Sites containing:
 
Gratuitous displays of violence and abuse of humans and animals which endorses or threatens physical harm
Depictions of sex, pornography, paedophilia
Obscene and vulgar language; excessive swearing
Any type of promotions and unnecessary references of alcohol, smoking and drug misuse
Any type of offensive references and discrimination towards humanity (e.g. racial, political, ethnic, religious, gender-based, sexuality based or personal)
Any type of overtly political communication
Any type of religious or occultism content, imagery or symbols
Any form of illegal activity or their promotions (e.g. how to build a bomb, robbing, hacking, software piracy)
Any type of illegal substance or activity sites with illegal, false or deceptive investment advice and money-making opportunities
Any type of content that reasonable public consensus deem to be improper or inappropriate.
No soft or hardcore sexual displays, including but not limited to: no naked or topless women or women in lingerie, no naked body from behind.
No depiction of extreme violence
Political and Cultural limitations, this includes but is not limited to:
No Content with political sponsorship, political views, religious views.
No mentioning or showing anything in relationship to the ruling persons or families of countries that the Mobitrans Services are advertised in. This includes, but is not limited to, Gulf Cooperation Council countries, e.g. Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Bahrain.
No content proposing or alluding to betting or gambling.
No content referring, proposing or alluding to use drugs or alcohol
No use of any Arab related idioms in a possible offensive way, such as camels, local Arab costume etc.No Co-Registration

program.name: Brain2Train - Norway - Non Incentivized
program.description:
Brain2Train is an interactive and fun service for users to test their brainpower and compete against their friends. Subscribers receive challenging daily quizzes which will be displayed on their mobile phone screen and the game is played using the handset. The questions range from puzzles to challenging reasoning problems that are sure to improve their brain creativity as users go through the challenging questions. This service is currently live only in select countries.

Valid lead criteria: A Valid lead occurs once a User submits his/her mobile # and confirms with PIN code. MT Flow

Typical Demographics: No restrictions. Open to all.
program.restrictions:
Norway traffic only 

iFrame elements are not allowed to be used on advertiser's Landing Pages

No Email Marketing
No Incentivizedno pop ups and full page ads

Using fake or misleading IDs and Messages on Instant Messengers and Social Networking Platforms to advertise Services. Creating a false impression of winning a prize, entering a lucky draw or lottery, etc before directing to Mobitrans Services etc. Creating false impressions by promoting services that are not 100% free for the consumers as if they are free by using for instance texts like: Free Ringtones, or 100% Free Videos.
Advertising through usage of any type of malware, virus or otherwise unwanted software installations on the end users’ device or computer.
 
The Affiliate Partner will not promote services on sites (mobile or web) that are not suitable for viewing by a general audience. The following are examples of the type of sites that are not suitable. Sites containing:
 
Gratuitous displays of violence and abuse of humans and animals which endorses or threatens physical harm
Depictions of sex, pornography, paedophilia
Obscene and vulgar language; excessive swearing
Any type of promotions and unnecessary references of alcohol, smoking and drug misuse
Any type of offensive references and discrimination towards humanity (e.g. racial, political, ethnic, religious, gender-based, sexuality based or personal)
Any type of overtly political communication
Any type of religious or occultism content, imagery or symbols
Any form of illegal activity or their promotions (e.g. how to build a bomb, robbing, hacking, software piracy)
Any type of illegal substance or activity sites with illegal, false or deceptive investment advice and money-making opportunities
Any type of content that reasonable public consensus deem to be improper or inappropriate.
No soft or hardcore sexual displays, including but not limited to: no naked or topless women or women in lingerie, no naked body from behind.
No depiction of extreme violence
Political and Cultural limitations, this includes but is not limited to:
No Content with political sponsorship, political views, religious views.
No mentioning or showing anything in relationship to the ruling persons or families of countries that the Mobitrans Services are advertised in. This includes, but is not limited to, Gulf Cooperation Council countries, e.g. Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Bahrain.
No content proposing or alluding to betting or gambling.
No content referring, proposing or alluding to use drugs or alcohol
No use of any Arab related idioms in a possible offensive way, such as camels, local Arab costume etc.No Co-Registration

Valid lead criteria: A Valid lead occurs once a User submits his/her mobile # and confirms with PIN code. MT Flow

Note: The usage of any Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval.
Please contact the relevant Adsmarket representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives

program.name: Yur Mobile Colombia - Incentivized
program.description:
Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how toconvert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide. 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners. 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by Pincode. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high. 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
CO traffic only

Incentivized/VC traffic is allowed.

Content blocking traffic is allowed.

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

 any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.


Movistar Colombia is not allowing web optin anymore, and the operator has been shuit down by the SMS provider.

Cards, Slots, Sports, Puzzle, Arcade and more

Publishers that are interested in running any IAC program must sign this addendum first: http://docs.matomy.com/1/Advertisers/Forms/IAC-publisher-addendum.pdf

Browsers: IE and FF only. This application is not compliant with other browsers.

All creatives (even if previously approved by the advertiser) must include the relevant IAC product's logo. The borders (frames) of all banners must be visible to the viewer, and cannot blend into the background of the site where it is displayed. No mention of Hulu is permitted. No duplicate IPs.

program.name: Yur Mobile Australia
program.description:
Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS message. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
AU traffic onlyIncentivized/VC/Content Blocking is NOT allowed.It is strictly forbidden to use typo squatting (misspelled domain names of popular websites/brands) in relation with these campaigns in UK.
The following things are not allowed:
•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.
•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.
•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.
•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.
•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

program.name: Easyvoyage ES Non Incent Display Only WEB
program.description:
Description:
http://www.Easyvoyage.com is the first editorial portal devoted to travel with trade intermediation. Easyvoyage presents an original approach combining four dimensions in one site: high-quality editorial content (a team of nearly 100 people, with 25 journalists who work non-stop seven days a week), comparison of market offers (flights, tours, holidays and hotels), classification of hotels (over 6,000 hotels qualified) and community approach (forum and product grading by the clients).

Offer Benefits:
Easyvoyage receives an average of 100,000 visitors a day, amounting to more than 6 million a month, with 10 million pages viewed. 10% of French Internet surfers use Easyvoyage to prepare their trip (holidays and tours). In 2009, Easyvoyage generated a volume of sales in excess of 450 million euros

User Flow: Click out flow -Users searches easyvoyage interface for flights on the search box and arrive at a search results page. Once the user clicks on one of the search results, a new window will appear for redirection. Pixel will fire on the pop.

Target demographic:
Ages +25
program.restrictions: Note: Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250

Flow:

 1.       El usuario debe hacer clic primero en alguno de nuestros banners que aparecen en los sites de Internet.

5.       Al introducir el código pin y cliquear en el botón pasa a la Thank You Page en la que la suscripción se ha realizado con éxito.

Pin code flow: User click on banner > LP > Type telephone number > Receive an SMS with a pin code > insert pin code in the box > User subscribed.

Key Words Restrictions:

1) Affiliates are not permitted to advertise in search advertising using keywords specific to AnastasiaDate, RussianBrides, AsianBeauties and AmoLatina (e.g. AnastasiaDate, Anastasia Romance, Anastasia International, AnastasiaWeb, Anastasia, RussianBrides, AsianBeauties, AmoLatina, etc.) and variations in terms of punctuation, spelling, the addition of words and/or the addition the addition of top-level domains (e.g. AnastasiaDate.com…).

2) Affiliates are not allowed to use exact matches or any variations of Dream-marriage.com, GlobalLadies.com, CharmingDate.com, ChnLove.com, Cupid.com and other dating sites.

3) Affiliates are not permitted to use the following words as metatags, keywords, hidden text, texts for advertising materials or other terms: “foreign affair”, “loveme”, “foreignladies.com” and permutations of these words and phrases; and the exact phrases “foreignladies.com”, “foreignwomen.com” and “asiansingles.com.”

4) Affiliates are strictly prohibited to use the following words as metatags, keywords, hidden text, texts for advertising materials or other terms: “Hot Russian Brides”, “HotRussianBrides.com”, “Russian Love Match”, “RussianLoveMatch.com” and variations in terms of punctuation, spelling, the addition of words and/or the addition the addition of top-level domains. (e.g. Hotrussianbrides.com, etc.)

• Password and/or login was generated by a publisher’s script;

Advertiser also retains the right to reject payment for leads if their number exceeds the campaign budget as indicated in this IO.

program.description:
Welcome to Boblil’s new campaign for Panama! This program allows you the best payout for Panama, with new and exciting products!Conversion is made By Server to Server Live Reporting! Boblil, is a leading Mobile entertainment brand focused on competition based services with high pay outs for affiliates. Our competition services create great opportunities for the end users and therefore have a very high conversion rates from clicks to sales. Boblil believes that in order to bring the best traffic to its landing pages, we should highly incentivize our affiliates; and therefore offers the best pay outs for any sales, with the most advanced tracking system that enable the affiliate to monitor the exact conversions from clicks to leads to sales.

program.restrictions:
PA Traffic Only.
No pops.

Usage of the word “FREE” or words with the same or similar meaning are not allowed in conjunction with any of the
Boblil campaigns. Additionally, creative’s used in conjunction with any Boblil offers may not be
misleading or deceptive. 
The following words and words with the same or similar meaning shall NOT be used:
•             Click here to claim your prize
•             Only X prizes left!
•             Only X minutes left!!
•             FREE/ free
•             Congratulations! You have won an XXX!
•             You are the winner of an XXX!
•             Daily winner!
•             Collect your XXX!
•             You are selected to receive a free XXXX
•             Guaranteed prize

Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.

graphics. As founder of a railroad company the user can turn a sleepy town with historical steam train into a vibrant metropolis with electric railways. form.

player name, e-mail address and a
password. After clicking on the “Register” button, the
user is sent an activation e-mail.

activation e-mail, or fills in the activation
code on himself, he / she is sent to the
website and receives a message that the
activation was successful.
3.1. The partner tracking pixel is
triggered at the moment of
activation.
The relevant entry can be found in
the source code for the HTML
page.

program.name: Shadow Kings - Int' - IOS - Non Incent
program.description:
Enter the quirky fantasy world of Shadow Kings: Join forces with unruly dwarves and proud elves and take on the vile forces of the shadows!

Experience a new dimension of gaming fun in this gripping free-to-play game. Defend your city against orcs, goblins and trolls! Fight or form alliances with other players to gain power and honor.

In the MMO Shadow Kings you control the fate of your city in a fantastic 3D world full of secrets and dangers. Raise a mighty army of elves, dwarves and humans. Sharpen your axe, draw your bow and go to war against barbaric opponents. Build your city into a mighty metropolis. Shield your people behind thick walls and collect taxes from them in return. Conduct trade and get your economy rolling. Crush the rise of wicked enemies, teach your pushy neighbors some respect and increase your influence by conquering outposts. Fight alone or join forces with other players in alliances. The competition for prestige, power and supremacy in the whole realm has begun!

Play Shadow Kings – the building and strategy game from the makers of Empire: Four Kingdoms – now on your Android smartphone or tablet.

User flow: Download, install and open the app for the first time

program.description:
3G is 1 click flow
Wifi is MO for easy and quick conversions.

Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how toconvert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landing page. Click the test link and agree!

 User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS message. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
Content Locking publishers must start with daily cap of 100 leads till quality is confirmed!
 
creative Guidelines: 

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

Mobile WEB campaigns:

Support of all Devices, OS (Android, iOS, Windows, Blackberry, Symbian) and Operators.

Yur Mobile is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how toconvert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. Yur Mobile is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landing page. Click the test link and agree!

 User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS message. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
It is STRICTLY forbidden to use your own banners/creatives. Only use ours or we need to give approval when you want to use your own banners.

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

BANNERS deatils:
Service has to be clearly identified through by the service name mention in legible letters or using the logo of the service.

Banners cannot pretend to be a feature of the site that you are being promoting, example:  
banner with Play icon and the phrase "Watch Movie" over the site movies playback.
download banner with icons saying "Download Now" between the real buttons of the  actual download site

Banners must not show a generic button with a call to action like "download now" for the sole purpose of click. The banner must have images or text that clearly describe the service. Would be prohibited using banners, that the only call-to-action they have are, for example:
o    DOWNLOAD
o    DOWNLOAD NOW
o    WATCH/SEE MOVIE

Banners with white, black or transparent background must have a visibly contrasting color edge to the background to distinguish well as something that is not part of the page where the banner is displayed.

Mini Games: Aside from its core gameplay, League of Angels has copious mini games which reward players with items to strengthen their party, and angel.

Hand-Drawn Art: League of Angels is filled with beautiful hand drawn artwork, setting it apart from other generic browser games.

program.name: Stormfall: Age of War Intl.
program.description:
Stormfall is a time-based MMORTS similar to Travian, complete with customizable armies, buildings, quests, and RPG elements. The story poses the lands of Darkshine in turmoil, as rival Lords battle over the remnants of the once-great Empire of Stormfall. The commoners cry out for a hero – one who will unite the empire and deliver them from the rising tide of an ancient evil.

You must fortify and defend your castle both from enemy NPCs and other players, raise your troops, and keep the people of your kingdom happy. Can you make your empire grow, or will it wither on the vine?

program.name: Sparta: War of Empires
program.description:
Set in Greece in the 5th century BC, Sparta: War of Empires immerses gamers into the role of a lord returned from an ongoing war against Xerxes and the Persian Empire, where politics and diplomacy prove as sharp as the blades of combat.  With assistance from King Leonidas and the Spartan army, players must protect their city-state from the constant Persian threat and hone their abilities as a strategist, diplomat and ruthless warrior.  In a land dictated by selfishness and brutality, survival is a fleeting hope for many.

Take control of ancient warriors and weapons and grow your resources and skills to dominate the ancient world of Greece.

High converting mobile content subscription offers from Jamba Mobile, one of the leading entertainment companies in the world.

2.    User clicks on one of the products and is subscribed to Jamba offer.

T-Mobile, vodafone – 2-click-flow:

2. User clicks on one of the products and is redirected to the order page where he has to confirm his order by clicking on "download"

3. By clicking on "download" a user is subscribed to Jamba offer.

- user clicks on purchase button is forwarded to Enter mobile phone number page

- user gets billed and is forwarded to downloadpage

:

program.name: EXCLUSIVE - eFix - Intl' - CPS - Non Incent
program.description:
Please note that this is a CPS program.
open to all GEOs, translated automatically (LP changes according to IP address)
Offer Review:    
eFix is a revolutionary 2nd generation online PC scan and repair tool, used by technicians worldwide, to repair damaged files while ensuring that healthy user data remains intact. eFix repairs damage caused by viruses, malwares, and Trojans by replacing damaged operating system files with certified Microsoft parts, making this the only product of its kind (The only repair solution with spare parts).  With eFix, you can keep using popular Windows 7 and don’t have to upgrade to Windows 8. eFix repairs problems in your PC without overriding programs or user data.

Affiliate Benefits:    
Our patented award winning software is an ideal way to produce revenue from existing or new visitors to your website.  We have a detailed in house tracking system allowing affiliates to track everything in REAL time from Click to Buy.

Valid Conversion Criteria:
Valid conversion occurs when user completes the installation and pays for a subscriptions (enters credit card info that is validated), regardless of opt-in to any bundles or submission of personal lead information.

Typical Demographics:  
•    web savvy English speaking PC user. Primarily male. Interested in shopping online, gambling , reads and researches blogs (e.g. experts-exchange.com), and has some technical knowledge (but is not an expert).
•    Young adults and students, who are internet savvy with very little or no technical knowledge, looking for a quick, efficient an inexpensive way to fix their PC.
•    Young couples who don't want to pay for a PC technician.
•    Young families with young kids who download content from problematic sites, damaging the family shared PC.
•    Older families whose teenaged kids are away at college, and are now left with no one to fix their PC.
•    Parents looking to keep their computer safe for their kids.
•    Old couples with very little or no technical knowledge, who prefer not to call a technician and their grandchildren don't have time for them.
program.restrictions:
No Mobile
No SEM (brand bidding, direct linking)

PUB payout is $46.15 WWW.

Valid Conversion Criteria:
Valid conversion occurs when user completes the installation and pays for a subscriptions (enters credit card info that is validated).

Creative Guidelines: Publishers may use their own creatives, as long as there is no blatantly misleading information (e.g. "you have 9 errors" is NOT approved). Generic banners are ok.

Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.
Negative list: Bigpoint Actionliga FussballManager XBlaster F1Manager Dark Orbit IceFighter Germanys Next Topmodel Mafia1930 Spaceinvasion Gladiatoren Chaoscars Deine11 Parsec Managergames Hockey Gladiatoren 2 The-Pimps Damoria Managergames Soccer Robofighter Land of Destruction Fragoria Seafight Gladius 2 The Mafia Glorykings Starpet PopstarsTheGame Speedcars Farmerama Battlestar Galactica Online Zoomumba War Of Titans Crimejacks Deepolis Hellblades Maestia Warstory Ponyrama Emporea Gangs of Crime Gangs of Crime 1930 Ruined Online Toon Racer BeBees Drakensang Online
Example of bookings which are not allowed: Bigpoint Big point Big-point Bgpont
If campaigns are being run for competitors who are on the negative list, it is forbidden to show Bigpoint games or to link directly to www.bigpoint.com or any of the Bigpoint games on the landing page of the corresponding search request.
